name: Rgrd
tagline: A R language package to make easy and fun play with Global Device Repositories
body:
### Welcome to Rgrd package.
This packages helps you to interact with a Global Devide Repository (GRD).

### Rgrd Manual
Get introduced to this package using our [Rgrd manual](https://github.com/eReuse/Rgrd/blob/master/Rgrd-manual.pdf)

### Currently under development
This package is currently under development but you can test how to retrive GRD using GRD REST API implementation.

### Authors, support or Contact
@dfranquesa
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
